aggregateReportExportFields.title: source_ip
aggregateReportExportFields.description: IP address of the server sending the email

aggregateReportExportFields.title: PTR
aggregateReportExportFields.description: Reverse DNS lookup of the source_ip

aggregateReportExportFields.title: spf
aggregateReportExportFields.description: Whether SPF alignment was pass or fail

aggregateReportExportFields.title: dkim
aggregateReportExportFields.description: Whether DKIM alignment was pass or fail

aggregateReportExportFields.title: disposition
aggregateReportExportFields.description: What the receiving server did with the emails (none=delivered, quarrantine=spam folder, reject=not delivered)

aggregateReportExportFields.title: org_name
aggregateReportExportFields.description: Description of the organisation which sent the report this data is from
